description:
Around 650 sq. feet (58 sq. meters). The apartment is in a luxury building with doorman, business center, gym and playroom. Fully furnished, with a king size bed in the bedroom and queen size futon in the living room that sleeps 2 more.  The kitchen is fully equipped for your cooking pleasure. High speed WIFI in the apartment.

The apartment is very quiet and bright, it receives natural sunlight all day long.  

(Sheets and towels are provided) .
name: Luxury 1 bed -- UWS -- Sleeps four -- Close to all
